contents.texts:
Thank god you wake up!
 You are in the castle of Dracula and the sun
 is covered by the castle!

You are the chosen warrior to defeat
 Dracula and save the world!

Wait, what?
No way!
Am I in the dream?

I guess yes...
But wait, how am I supposed to get out of here?!

OK, so there are 4 levels in total
and each level contains several rooms which
 are connected to each other randomly.

One BOSS lives in a special rooom
 protected by a key in each level.
 You need to find the key somewhere in the room
 and defeat the BOSS to proceed to next level.

You might encounter all kinds of monsters,
 items and NPCs during your adventure.
I'll see you in the top level. Good luck!
